title: Gift Cards not working error?
body: Cant add my gift care for 10$ its all ready been 2 days i don't know what to do the error says that i have exceeded the maximum code redemption at this time. But i have not been putting in cards at all this month?

replies.body: If you try and fail too many times when putting in a code, you might get locked out for 24 hours. Each time you try before that waiting period is up can extend the amount of time that you're locked out. We do this as a way to help prevent card fraud. You'll need to wait the full 24 hours before trying again, but if you still can't get that code to work shoot our billing team a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help.
